name: flatted

scripts.build: npm run cjs && npm run rollup:esm && npm run rollup:es && npm run rollup:babel && npm run min && npm run test && npm run size
scripts.rollup:babel: rollup --config rollup/babel.config.js && sed -i.bck 's/^var /self./' index.js && rm -rf index.js.bck
scripts.rollup:es: rollup --config rollup/es.config.js && sed -i.bck 's/^var /self./' es.js && rm -rf es.js.bck
scripts.size: cat index.js | wc -c;cat min.js | wc -c;gzip -c9 min.js | wc -c;cat min.js | brotli | wc -c; cat es.js | brotli | wc -c; cat esm.js | brotli | wc -c
